body: Doesn’t seem to be related with Ueto Ruri’s previous series. Too bad, I do want to see more of Dia with Mari’s boyfriend’s junior. They’re not that bad as couple. This one is set when Kanan and Mari are not attending school and Dia is having a short relationship with campus student coming for teacher training. He left after summer, but Dia has known sex and it’s implied in the end she is doing it with the boy who saw her having sex in the festival. Next is LL Super Star.
